paper_abstract: In this paper, it is shown that, if Ishikawa's type iterative sequence associated with the nonlinear mappings G and H converges to a point, then the limit point is a common fixed point of the mappings G and H in L-fuzzy metric spaces.
paper_title: ON CONVERGENCE OF ISHIKAWA'S TYPE ITERATION TO A COMMON FIXED POINT IN L-FUZZY METRIC SPACES
